key.name: custom-bangs
key.description: A list of custom bangs where each entry is a JSON object containing the keys "key" and "url". Example: [{"key":"g","url":"https://google.com/search?q={query}"}].

key.name: default-search-engine
key.description: The default search engine URL to use when no bang is specified. The URL should contain "{query}" which will be replaced with the search terms.

key.name: enable-default-search
key.description: Whether to show default search results when no bang is specified.
